Perceptor:

"Yes, Maxima?"replied the male








--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> Maxima strode in (if others are there, then so be it) to the 
Bridge. 
> 
> Glancing around as she strode up to the consoles to have a look 
see. It was 
> her past duties to make sure everything was fuctional & steady. 
Sometimes it 
> was her duty. Otherwise she was sent off on recon missions, or 
assignations, 
> offensives, & more. 
> 
> She stood at a console & studied the view of the security cam as 
it scanned 
> the area. It was so much more different than the Earth she knew... 
in the 
> future according to this time period. 
> 
> Then.. it struck her. "Megatron," she whispered to herself. She 
had 
> completely forgotten about the Ark. With the new form, she was a 
little 
> closer to her old form as a jet. But.. there was still a ways to 
go. 
> 
> Eventually, then the time was right... she would go to the Ark. 
pondering a 
> moment. Why not now? Everything was very quiet. Including Hydras. 
Flicker 
> gone... Blackstorm was calming down... nothing much was happening. 
She had to 
> make sure the others were fine.. her comrades... 
> 
> It pained her just a tad... this meant, leaving the Pred base.. & 
possibly 
> not returning, either for a while.. or at all. 
> 
> She Looked over a map of the current world, as it was logged into 
her meta 
> processor. Once she gathered the right information, she left the 
Bridge. 
> 
> Striding towards one of the exits, but before that... she 
sidetracked to the 
> CR Chamber. 
> 
> Opening the door, she glanced inside, "Perceptor?"
